name: Agentic AI
notes: Autonomous AI systems that can plan and execute complex tasks with minimal human oversight

name: Generative AI & Multimodal Models
notes: Advanced AI models capable of processing and generating text, images, audio, and video simultaneously

name: AI-Augmented Software Engineering
notes: AI tools that assist in code generation, testing, debugging, and software architecture design

name: AI Safety & Governance Platforms
notes: Systems for ensuring AI alignment, transparency, and ethical deployment across organizations

name: Multi-Agent Systems
notes: Coordinated AI agents that collaborate to solve complex problems beyond individual agent capabilities

name: Humanoid Robots
notes: Bipedal robots designed for human environments with advanced manipulation and mobility

name: Swarm Robotics
notes: Coordinated groups of simple robots working together for complex tasks like search and rescue

name: Edge AI & Federated Learning
notes: AI processing on local devices with privacy-preserving distributed model training

name: Quantum Computing
notes: Quantum processors solving problems intractable for classical computers in optimization and simulation

name: Post-Quantum Cryptography
notes: Cryptographic algorithms resistant to attacks from both classical and quantum computers

name: Structural Battery Composites
notes: Battery materials that serve as both energy storage and structural components

name: Green Nitrogen Fixation
notes: Low-energy processes for fertilizer production reducing agricultural carbon footprint

name: Next-Gen Nuclear (SMRs)
notes: Small Modular Reactors offering scalable, safer nuclear energy with reduced waste

name: Carbon Capture & Utilization
notes: Technologies that capture CO2 and convert it into valuable products and materials

name: Engineered Living Therapeutics
notes: Genetically engineered cells and microbes designed as precision medical treatments

name: RNA & Epigenetic Therapies
notes: Next-generation genetic medicines targeting RNA and epigenetic modifications

name: Bio-Digital Interfaces
notes: Direct interfaces between biological systems and digital computing platforms

name: Synthetic Biology Platforms
notes: Automated platforms for designing and engineering biological systems at scale

name: 6G Networks
notes: Next-generation wireless networks integrating sensing, AI, and sub-THz frequencies

name: Satellite Internet Constellations
notes: Global broadband networks using low-earth orbit satellite mega-constellations

name: Collaborative Sensing Networks
notes: Distributed sensor networks that share data for comprehensive environmental monitoring

name: Digital Twin of the Customer
notes: Comprehensive virtual models of customer behavior, preferences, and journeys

name: Superapps
notes: Integrated platforms combining multiple services, apps, and functionalities

name: Machine Customers
notes: Autonomous systems that can identify needs, negotiate, and make purchases without human intervention

name: AI-Driven Cyber Defense
notes: Autonomous security systems that predict, detect, and respond to threats in real-time

name: Quantum-Safe Networking
notes: Network infrastructure resistant to quantum computing-based attacks

name: Decentralized Digital Identity (DID)
notes: Self-sovereign identity systems giving users control over their personal data

name: Green IT & Sustainable Data Centers
notes: Energy-efficient computing infrastructure with minimal environmental impact

name: Circular Electronics Manufacturing
notes: Closed-loop production systems that eliminate waste and maximize material reuse

name: AI for Climate Resilience
notes: AI systems predicting climate impacts and optimizing adaptation strategies
